title: Dinnerbone：旁观者的瞬移机制
author: Neubulaeko
txt_content:
本帖最后由 a20001017 于 2014-5-6 19:56 编辑 

Nathan Adams @Dinnerbone
Had some inspiration on how to finish up Spectators with teleport-to-x mechanics, it might need some fancy UI work but it's worth a try!



Dinnerbone：我有一个灵感:让旁观者横向瞬移！应该要一些华丽的界面，不过值得尝试！
PS：改了好多了吧？

replies.author: HGK
replies.txt_content:
但是很值啊！
看不懂什么意思
要补习一下语文了么？
